ConsortiaLevelInfo.Description: Required to unlock other Guild buildings. Guild Level raises the member cap, currently at 30 members.
Upgrading will increase your guild's maximum membership to 50.

After leveling up Guild, blessings at the Deity can give items. Blessing attempts increase with levels.
Offer blessings to the guild and receive valuable items! (Max 3 times per day)
Offer blessings to the guild and receive valuable items! (Max 6 times per day)
Offer blessings to the guild and receive valuable items! (Max 9 times per day)
Blessings can give valuable items, 12 attempts daily. Unlocks new a Deity.

Blessings can give valuable items, 21 attempts daily. Unlocks a new Deity.

Safely stores Guild members' items to free up slots, level up to unlock this.
